set:
(:action set_spy_group ; set up the spy group
      :parameters (?p - player ?co - co_conspirator)
      :precondition (and (not (in_group ?co ?p)))
      :effect (and (in_group ?co ?p))
)
talk:
(:action talk_in_private ; talk in private to discuss plans
      :parameters (?p - player ?npc - npc)
      :precondition (and (in_group ?npc ?p) (not (talking ?npc ?p)))
      :effect (and (talking ?npc ?p))
)
gather:
(:action gather_gear ; gather spy gear
      :parameters (?p - player ?gear - equipment)
      :precondition (and (not (gathered ?gear)))
      :effect (and (gathered ?gear))
)

(:action find_victim ; identify a victim for spying
      :parameters (?p - player ?v - victim)
      :precondition (and (not (identified ?v)))
      :effect (and (identified ?v))
)
```

The actions are defined to reflect the steps and their descriptions, considering the necessary preconditions and effects based on the entity states provided.
